metadata.title: ymtaz
metadata.description: At ymtaz, we bring your cinematic dreams to life

points.continuousUpdates: The app provides continuous updates on new laws and regulations that may affect your legal status.
points.legalAdvice: You can get legal advice anytime and from anywhere through the app.
points.bookAppointments: You can quickly and easily book appointments with lawyers and legal experts without the need to visit offices.
points.confidentiality: Your personal and legal information is kept strictly confidential through the app.
points.documentManagement: You can organize and manage your legal documents and cases easily through the app.
points.securePayments: You can pay consultation and legal service fees through the app using secure and easy payment methods.

homeSectionView.title: Discover a new world of ease and security with Ymtaz!
homeSectionView.subtitle: Provides you with all legal services and consultations
homeSectionView.subtitle2: With all professionalism and expertise by a group of specialized consultants

consultationWindow.title: Consultation Window
consultationWindow.description: You can request your written or visual consultation in various legal specialties, whether you are an individual, company, or legal entity. This is done through a professional electronic system with fast and productive interaction, and high technical and legal governance.

servicesPortal.title: Services Portal
servicesPortal.description: You can request any legal service immediately, urgently, or scheduled by Ymtaz service providers. You will be served professionally within a distinctive legal service system in high demand.

appointmentsMemo.title: Appointments Memo
appointmentsMemo.description: A unique service provided by Ymtaz to meet the requests of distinguished clients, including scheduling in-person or remote appointments to discuss client concerns and provide the necessary consultation at the appropriate time and place, according to a scheduling system that meets the increasing demand for this request.

digitalGuide.title: Digital Guide
digitalGuide.description: Here, elite licensed lawyers, legal advisors, and certified professionals from various legal professions and regions of Saudi Arabia meet in a comprehensive digital guide. It facilitates communication with them and highlights their skills, experiences, and specialties in various distinguished legal fields.

advisoryBoard.title: Advisory Board
advisoryBoard.description: An elite group of distinguished legal professionals proficient in providing opinions and advice on sensitive, complex, and precise cases. They handle customer and service provider consultations with utmost precision and professionalism.

judicialGuide.title: Judicial Guide
judicialGuide.description: A wide judicial guide, constantly updated, includes phone numbers, locations, and email addresses of all governmental, judicial, and quasi-judicial bodies. It covers all levels of litigation, courts, and entities directly related to judicial and legal work.

libraryAndRegulations.title: Library and Regulations
libraryAndRegulations.description: The library and regulations section includes everything related to Saudi systems, their regulations, and decisions, along with translations of their texts. It offers a very rich search system accompanied by a comprehensive legal researcher product specialized in all matters related to Saudi systems and judicial codices.

trainingPlatform.title: Training Platform
trainingPlatform.description: A unique product offered by Ymtaz to all those wishing to develop themselves in various legal fields for specialists or enhance legal awareness and culture for individuals through a distinguished training system rich in meticulously prepared content presented by elite legal trainers in various fields.

subscribeSection.title: Subscribe to the newsletter to receive all the latest news
subscribeSection.info: Once you send your email, you will receive the latest services provided by Imtaz
